titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the death of that renowned Prince Rupert. Who departed this life on Wednesday, Novemb. 29. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Rainbow, near St. Andrews-Church, in Holbourn,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Ah! Cruel death, what hast thou lately done? ..."
Imperfect: stained, affecting text and imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Rainbow, near St. Andrews-Church, in Holbourn
